block.p: COMMISSIONER'S OFFICE -- Suspended Gilberto Reyes, Montreal Expos catcher, for 60 days for violating his aftercare program and baseball's drug policy. American League
COMMISSIONER'S OFFICE -- Suspended Gilberto Reyes, Montreal Expos catcher, for 60 days for violating his aftercare program and baseball's drug policy. American League
BOSTON RED SOX -- Agreed to terms with Luis Rivera, shortstop, on a one-year contract.
CLEVELAND INDIANS -- Agreed to terms with Jerry Browne, second baseman, on a one-year contract.
NEW YORK YANKEES -- Agreed to terms with Greg Cadaret, pitcher, on a one-year contract.
OAKLAND ATHLETICS -- Agreed to terms with Mike Moore, pitcher, on a one-year contract.
TORONTO BLUE JAYS -- Agreed to terms with Roberto Alomar, second baseman, on a three-year contract, and David Wells, pitcher, and Manuel Lee, infielder, on one-year contracts. National League
CHICAGO CUBS -- Agreed to terms with Mark Grace, first baseman, to a one-year contract.
CINCINNATI REDS -- Agreed to terms with Chris Sabo, third baseman, on a one-year contract, and Ted Power, pitcher, on a minor-league contract.
LOS ANGELES DODGERS -- Agreed to terms with Juan Samuel, infielder, on a one-year contract. Football Arena Football
AFL -- Announced that New York City has been awarded an expansion franchise for the 1993 season. Professional Spring Football League

WASHINGTON MARAUDERS -- Named Daniel Lounsbury offensive coordinator; Angelo Ortiz equipment manager; John McGuire video director; Adam Gold director of sales; and Lisa Neely marketing assistant. Claimed Randell Holmes, linebacker, off waivers from the Arkansas Miners. World League of American Football OHIO GLORY -- Named Joe Viadella running backs coach and Barry Pettyjohn and Mike Dunlevy intern coaches.
SACRAMENTO SURGE -- Named Bob Moran wide receivers coach and Jim Miblack assistant coach. Hockey National Hockey League
BOSTON BRUINS -- Traded Craig Janney, center, and Stephane Quintal, defenseman, to the St. Louis Blues for Adam Oates, center.
PHILADELPHIA FLYERS -- Traded Tony Horacek, left wing, to the Chicago Blackhawks for Ryan McGill, defenseman.
SAN JOSE SHARKS -- Traded Tony Hrkac, center, to the Chicago Blackhawks for a conditional selection in the 1993 entry draft.
